title: Complete Warhammer 40K RPG Collection (Dark Heresy, Rogue Trader
description:
This is a (to date) complete collection of Fantasy Flight Games' line of Warhammer 40,000 Roleplay books, spanning all 5 of their WH40K product lines. 

All books save one are in Original Electronic Format (OEF) and are thus searchable, and most of them are bookmarked. 

I've also added some selected homebrew material and a few PC tools to help automate some gaming tasks.

Don't Forget - if you like the books, buy them. Support the game developer so they can continue to make awesome games.

This torrent contains as follows:

Black Crusade:
	Sourcebooks:
		Core Rulebook
		Game Master's Kit
		Tome of Blood
		Tome of Excess
		Tome of Fate
		Errata CS3

	Scenario Books:	
		Hand of Corruption
		Broken Chains
		Broken Chains Additional Characters

	Character Sheets

Dark Heresy
	Sourcebooks:
		Core Rulebook
		Game Master's Kit
		Ascension
		Blood of Martyrs
		Book of Judgement
		Creatures Anathema
		Daemon Hunter
		Disciples of The Dark Gods
		Heed the Higher Call (Ascension Companion)
		Heresy Begets Retribution (Ascension/Blood of Martyrs Companion)
		The Inquisitor's Handbook
		The Lathe Worlds
		The Lost Dataslate (The Lathe Worlds Companion)
		The Radical's Handbook
		Salvation Demands Sacrifice (Radical's Handbook Supplement)
		Errata v3.0

	Homebrew Material:
		40k Ammunitions and Upgrades   
		40k Weapons and Ammo Descriptions
		40K Wepons Compilation    
		Bolters v2.2
		Apocrypha: Vehicles
		Las weapons
		Power Armour
		The Calixis Sector Encyclopedia

	Scenario Books:		
		Purge the Unclean 
		Apostasy Gambit 1 - The Black Sepulchre
		Apostasy Gambit 2 - Church Of The Damned
		Apostasy Gambit 3 - The Chaos Commandment
		Haarlock's Legacy 1 - Tattered Fates
		Haarlock's Legacy 2 - Damned Cities
		Haarlock's Legacy 3 - Dead Stars
		Edge of Darkness(Demo Adventure)
		Shattered Hope(Demo Adventure)

	Various supplements, handouts and Character sheets
	Character creation and combat tools

Deathwatch
   	Sourcebooks:
		Core Rulebook
		Game Master's Kit
		First Founding
		Honour the Chapter
		Mark of the Xenos
		Rites of Battle
		The Achilus Assault
		The Emperors Chosen
		The Jericho Reach
		The Outer Reach
		Errata v1.1 

	Homebrew Material:
		Index Astartes Vol 1   
  
	Scenario Books:		
		Ark of Lost Souls Rising Tempest
		The Emperor Protects   
		Final Sanction(Demo Adventure)
		Oblivion's Edge(Demo Adventure)

	Various supplements, handouts and Character sheets
	Character Sheet Generator Tool (XLS)

Only War
	Sourcebooks:
		Core Rulebook
		Game Master's Kit
		Enemies of the Imperium
		Hammer of The Emperor
		Errata v1.0

	Scenario Books:		
		Final Testament(Demo Adventure)
		Eleventh Hour

	Character and Squad Sheets, Various Supplements
	Experience Calculator Tool(JAR)


Rogue Trader
	Sourcebooks:
		Battlefleet Koronus
		Core Rulebook (1.4 errata edited-in)
		Game Master's Kit
		Edge of the Abyss
		Epoch Koronus
		Faith and Coin (scan)
		Hostile Acquisitions
		Into The Storm
		Stars of Inequity
		The Koronus Bestiary
		The Navis Primer
		The Soul Reaver
		The Dark Kin (Soul Reaver Companion)
		Errata v1.4

	Homebrew Material:
		Converted Dark Heresy Psychic Powers

	Scenario Books:		
		Lure of the Expanse (+Traitor's Nexus addon)
		Dark Frontier(Demo Adventure)
		Forsaken Bounty(Demo Adventure)
		Warpstorm Trilogy - 1 - The Frozen Reaches
		Warpstorm Trilogy - 2 - Citadel of Skulls
		Warpstorm Trilogy - 3 - Fallen Suns

	Various supplements, handouts and Character/Ship/System sheets
	Various tools and generators

General Combat and Dice Rolling tools
